name: The Escape
paragraphs: You and the child keep moving towards the exit, fighting off any threats that come your way. The hospital seems never-ending, and every turn reveals even more horrors. But you don't give up hope. You keep moving forward, driven by a desire to survive and protect the child.

Finally, you see a glimmer of light in the distance. You pick up your pace, feeling like you're almost there. But as you get closer, you realize that something is wrong. The exit is blocked by rubble, and there's no way through. Your heart sinks, and you feel like all hope is lost.

Just as you're about to give up, you hear a voice calling out from the other side of the rubble. It turns out to be a rescue team, alerted by the survivors you helped earlier. They start clearing the way, and you and the child finally make it out of the hospital alive. As you emerge into the sunlight, you can't help but cry tears of relief and gratitude for surviving such a horrifying experience.
